description: The Japanese painted fern is an amazing plant species with its delicate foliage and unique color pattern. Its tissue-thin leaflets are beautifully adorned with vivid silver and burgundy hues over a bed of deep green. The 'Wildwood Twist' variety is a standout among painted ferns, with loops and curls that add texture and dimension to any space. Plus, the Japanese painted fern is easy to care for and doesn't require a lot of water or attention. Its feather-like foliage is a unique addition to any home and is sure to impress.
